channel.title: Mohammed Ahmed
channel.description: Reflections on technology, travel, and life.

item.title: Na-ve-min (My Name): On Gifts, Nicknames, and Assumptions
item.description: Our names are the first gifts we’re given — non-returnable, but often exchanged. This is a reflection on mine: Mohammed, Moe, Watermelon — and the expectations that come with each.
